attributes.action: Lodge a protest against the New Law in Portugal which has resulted in the Murderers of a British Businessman going free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Three murderers have been set free in Portugal after having only spent 18 months of a 22 year sentence in jail, this was made possible by the New Law in Portugal allowing any Foriegn national in prison there, who have an appeal pending, to be set free till said appeal is heard.  This process could take up to a year.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
